summary: Conversion of Dark Disciple to UNP body.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Hey there! [/size]

This is a conversion of the Dark Disciple to UNP body.

First of all, I did this conversion for personal use. There are flaws, is not perfect as I would like.
I'm not a 3D modeler/designer, actually I don't even how to launch Blender. :P

But I decided share with everyone this conversion because no one did it yet.

[size=4][b]Requirements: [/b][/size]
UNP Body (really?)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?[/url]

Dark Disciple armor by BetterBecause.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42398/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42398/?[/url]

[size=4][b]Installation: [/b][/size]
Install Dark Disciple by BetterBecause
Install my mod overwriting the original files

-
[size=4][b]Known issues: [/b][/size]
As mentioned above, the mesh have some imperfections.
I have not modified hands and feet meshes, then they will not fit perfectly with the body armor.

-
[b]*Bonus*
[/b]
Accidentally, I found 3 bugs in "darkstandalone.esp" original file, created by BetterBecause.
When BetterBecause make this file, he forgot to rename the file first person nif file.

You can fix this manually - is easy. :)

Open DarkStandalone.esp in TES5Edit or CK.

bug 1:
Look for [b]FullLeatherGlovesDD[/b]

[b]Armor\Studded\Female\1stPersongloves_1.nif[/b] change it to  [b]armor\BBs\catsuit_hands_1.nif[/b]

Bug 2:
look for [b]FullLeatherGlovesCD[/b]

[b]Armor\Leather\Female\1stPersomgloves_1.nif[/b] change it to  = [b]Armor\BBs\catsuit_T_hands_1.nif[/b]

Bug 3:
look for [b]FullLeatherCuirassCD[/b]

[b]Armor\Studded\Female\1stPersonbody_1.nif[/b] change it to [b]armor\BB's\Catsuit_T_1stPerson_1.nif[/b]

As said, these 3 bugs are present in [i]darkstandalone.esp[/i] file, unfortunately I can't upload this file fixed.
You will have to fix it manually.

-
Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759/]ousnius[/url]'s tutorial teaching how convert armors using BodySlide.
[size=4][b]Credits: [/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42398/?]Dark Disciple textures[/url] by betterbecause
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41534/?]Shiny Rubber Catsuits[/url] original meshes by mxwqtkl
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url] by Caliente
[url=http://www.elderscrolls.com/]TES V: Skyrim[/url] by Bethesda
author: TheTag
